text: Irwin Hasen (July 8, 1918 â€“ March 13, 2015) was an American cartoonist. He was best known as the co-creator (with Gus Edson) of the Dondi comic strip. He was born in New York City. Hasen died at his home in New York City, aged 96. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American cartoonists Category:People from New York City
title: Irwin Hasen
